code: import React from"react";import{useLocation,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const queryParams=new URLSearchParams(location.search);const role=queryParams.get("role");const handleLogin=()=>{if(role==="influencer"){navigate("/influencer/home");}else if(role==="brand"){navigate("/brand/home");}else{alert("Please select a valid role");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-10 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-purple-600",children:"Login to Fluence House"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mt-4 text-gray-600",children:["You are logging in as: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:role?role.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+role.slice(1):"Unknown"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,className:"mt-6 bg-purple-600 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-purple-700",children:"Continue"})]});};export default Login;
